lines: The Drama Club is putting on a production and they are asking for people to come down, join the club, and audition. Are you interested?
For what kind of part would you like to try out?
Your social skills help you to win the part with ease.
Unfortunately, on opening night you suffer from a severe case of stage fright and are a flop.
On opening night you are a runaway success. Social and Confidence characteristics continue to rise.
I'm sorry, you don't have the combination of social skills and confidence needed to successfully land the part.
You get the job and become an important part of the behind the scenes operation of the play. Your Confidence and Social scores rise.
I'm sorry, but you don't have the Intellectual skills to do the job.
Perhaps you are too shy for this sort of thing right now. You'll probably play out enough dramas of your own during this part of your life to create a mini-series, so maybe you won't be missing much.
